info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued June 07 at 11:51PM CDT until June 08 at 5:00AM CDT by NWS Amarillo
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 1215 AM CDT FOR SOUTHWESTERN BEAVER...EAST CENTRAL TEXAS AND NORTH CENTRAL OCHILTREE COUNTIES... At 1151 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 8 miles west of Bryans Corner, or 19 miles northwest of Perryton, moving east at 30 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor damage to roofs, siding, and trees is possible. Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Locations impacted include... Bryans Corner and Boyd. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
